title: The Lord Judges Ahaziah
summary: King Ahaziah of Israel falls from his palace and sends messengers to consult Baal-Zebub, the god of Ekron, about his recovery. Elijah intercepts them and delivers Godâ€™s judgment. When Ahaziah sends soldiers to seize Elijah, fire from heaven consumes them until Elijah finally agrees to come and speak directly.

faq.question: Why did God judge King Ahaziah?
faq.answer: Because he sought guidance from a false god instead of the Lord.

faq.question: What happened to the soldiers sent to capture Elijah?
faq.answer: Fire from heaven consumed two groups of fifty men before Elijah went with the third.
